name: Sorting of Sorts
description:
Controls:
Drag to create/remove conveyors and sorters.
Click sorters for settings.
Click the ► Play button to run the factory.
You win by sorting the numbers in ascending order!
Z to undo. R to restart. Esc for level select.

Sorting is easy as 1, 3, 2! Wait, that doesn't seem right. Sort the numbers back into ascending order in this attempt to make factory programming puzzle games (also known as "zachlikes") more accessible! It's my submission to the "Thinky Games are for Everyone" jam.

Made with my fork of Puzzlescript (more details & credits here).
